attributes.title: Cherish What Is Eternal
attributes.description:
In today's (25th September, 2015) Nithya Satsang In Living Advaita Series, Paramahamsa Nithyananda enters into 14th verse of Isavasya Upanishad. 

This verse can make us experience the peace of the cosmos. The deepest most part of the cosmos is peace - Sadashiva. By cognizing what is imperishable - authentic, what gives you the experience of the eternal space of oneness and what is perishable - inauthentic. How much ever pleasant, sweet it may be, never choose perishable, inauthentic entities – whether it is a person or attitude or thinking style – do not choose inauthenticity. The cause of happening is Shambhava. He gives the essence as - "Celebrate the Imperishable, the eternal. Cognize what is imperishable, what is perishable. Then the eternal space of oneness becomes your reality – amrutam ashnote, nectar of immoratlity and bliss.
